name: Justicia
description: Justicia is a large genus of about 600 species of evergreen perennials and shrubs in the family Acanthaceae, native to Americas, Africa and India.Justicia has unusual spikes of tubular flower clusters, and leaves which are often strongly veined. This attractive shade-loving plant is easy to grow and easy to propagate.
meaning: The genus was named in honor of Scottish horticulturist James Justice (1698â€“1763).
color_description: Justicia comes in shades of red, orange, pink, yellow, white and cream.
